title: Inquire About a Contract Award
description: A vendor who bid on a contract wants to know if a decision has been made.

tasks.description: Identify the vendor and the specific contract they bid on.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the contract in the procurement system.

tasks.description: Check the status of the contract award.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the contract has been awarded to another vendor.

tasks.description: Inform the vendor of the outcome. If public, provide the name of the winning vendor and the award amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent communicates the decision to the vendor.
